channel.title: ★ Soulstorm [718] ★ [The comeback of the missing land] ★ VPS hosted
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4493935/desqhz.jpg[/img]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=4][COLOR="#FF0000"]As you know, that one day Xymo-scape gone off, i decided the comeback will be stronger! it will have more hard work and patience... this time, Soulstorm is going to replace Xymo-scape with a better version from ALL the sides.[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]JAR Link: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/7dqclbl4xs84cor/Soulstorm.jar?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/7dqclbl4xs84cor/Soulstorm.jar?dl=0[/url][/FONT][/CENTER] [FONT=Century Gothic][CENTER]Website: [url=http://soulstorm718.com]http://soulstorm718.com[/url][/CENTER][/FONT]
[CENTER][COLOR="#FF0000"][SIZE=4][FONT=Century Gothic]Now, here is every single step i did in that game to make it one of the most professional world-wide Runescape private servers:[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER] [CODE]Fixed all anti-leeches fixed toolbelt (wont delete item after adding to toolbelt) Added charms drop for all monsters Added bank pins/reseting bank pins -- FIXED Fixed changing display Fixed prestiging - resets all your skills now Trivia rewards! FIXED! Crystal chest FIXED added crystal chest rewards! added dungeoneering points to actiontab added prestige button to account manager with number of your prestiges! removed every shit out of shops Fixed all shops fixed crafting buttons! (press craft on opal etc) Added black marks added Playedtime recording All npcs with 1 hp now has hp max hit and combat level added troll invasion added troll invasion dialogue added troll points add troll shop Changed captain jute options to (talk-to, rewards) Updated Troll book info! updated all troll invasion with the info and rewards and the book is ready added herbicide added bonecrusher fixed eos pkp points shop Added the xp well added a timer for xp well! added xp well time in action tab Xp well is now 8 hours and it resets to 0 after the resetment Added osp exchanging shop Added ecto tokens shop (named it zombies) added stuff to zombies shop changed the whole prestige shop Fixed if higher difficulty, more points Fixed developer panel Prestige is now unlimited Prestige shop prices has been changed fixed slayer x0 infernal mage problem Fixed chaos tunnels stairs and spawns fixed ancient cavern stairs and spawns fixed Lumbridge swamp fixed Fremennik slayer dungeon fixed slayer tower fixed taverly dungeon fixed polypore dungeon fixed brimhaven dungeon fixed jadinko lair added mos le'harmless cave adding stronghold of secuity all doors, rewards, skeleton, escape. added asgarian npc dump, skeletal wyvern, going into the hole Fixed pendants added chatlogs added tradelogs fixed Seeker's charm added smoke dungeon added desert lizards added wizard mizgog to slayer teles fixed glacors added strykewyrms! added all bones to get buried added all bones on altar! fixed warning reset after the ban added unwarning to reset all your black marks adding recipe for disaster fixed changing display issue (refunded if (invalid name) or (name alraedy in use)) Added Armour stand added a teleportation system fixed all training teles fixed all low/med/high training! fixed waterfall doors karamja volcano fixed grotworms cave added wildy wyrm fixed waterfall dungeon fixed bronze dragons fixed dwagore dungeon with spawns fixed yklagor the thundors fixed glacors added glacors npcs added bonuses for everything Added Soulstorm guide added starting tutorial fixed abusing starters (only 1 time talk) added skiller shop fixed the whole stronghold of security dungeon with all npcs added full slayer. added resettask fixed slayer points fixed slayer interface fixed slayer helm + fully charged one fixed the quest tab fixed the new quest tab with good ideas added donor infos added a better ticket system handling added the difficulty pop up so you can choose carefully fixed the going out of tutorial island without starter fixed full agility fixed all gnome agility with the plane 3 and jumpling the pre swing fixed barbarian outspot fixed wilderness agility fixed pyramid added farming fixed yew trees fixed mage tress [added] now you can cut the yew/mage logs and after several logs it restarts added sunfreet added arior added auto getting in clan added abbys runecrafting added obelisk wilderness removed Charms from all shops added construction level requirement for the work bench finished adding level required for all the interface finished all xp given added all interfaces with all xp and things on construction fixed spam reloading cannon added cannon in prestige shop fixed account manager prestige equipment fixed gano drops + shop removed added drop logs fixed some drops blink, gano, arior etc fixed xp for all difficulties fixed drop rates for all difficulties added kills log added dragonkin lamp with dialogue and great xp! added effigy drop higher difficulty = more prestige tokens = more loyalty = more drop rate added accepted trade added declined trade added runespan added skilling to teleportation system added pk to teleportation system added agility dialogue fixed runespan added minigames to teleportation system fixed mining teleports added gem mining Progress finishing the teleportation system fixed fishing teleports added dungeoneering Added dungeoneering dialogue fixed xp + tokens from normal xp fixed summoning places fixed thieving stalls fixed theiving rewards fixed thieving teleports fixed smithing teleports fixed crafting prices fixed theiving prices finished the whole teleportation system (spriti tree now) removed all object for edgeville started with edgeville home fixed deleting objects on the source Deleted all neccesary object at edgeville added spirit tree fixed spades at barrows spawned npcs at edgeville spawned objects at edgeville Finished building home (edgeville) with teleporting ;;home and respawning there. more fixing on teleportation system fixed the trivia fixed all questions to trivia changed lyrics only 3 players per round spawned well more xp well fixing fixed trivia null "[i]" general fixes on action tab more progress on home stuff fixed taking a high level slayer master fixed slayer 100% points + system spawned all slayer masters added torva degerade when fight fixed donor information added more features to donors double xp to donors fixed titles added comp cape requirements fixed some shops added more shops named all npcs added highscores removed pk ranks! added trivia shop fixed trivia shop glitches (spins not working) general fixes to trivia added sports fixed sports questions added every single offhand in sunfreet added loyalty tent spawned loyalty shop added hunter teleports fixed player server messages added dicing fc added fury or to arior drops fixed trivia added full pest control fixed pest control portal fighting fixed pest control shop added seed pack added mineral pack added herb pack fixed lander leaving herb packs now gives for 30 points : a pack of herb Mineral packs now gives for 30 points : runite/adamantite ores seeds packs now gives for 30 points : yew/mage seeds added grimy wally, can now give good profit for players added pest controls wins as a requirement for comp cape added leeuni added lucien fixed low levels teleport fixed all teleports at the interface for teleporting added full godwars spawned all godwars npcs[/CODE]
[CENTER][SIZE=5][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR="#FF0000"]MEDIA:[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2vinq0j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/vgu06o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/11w9bhu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2rx7eah.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/25ouo1d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/vp91xd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/jqm1rq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2wrdl5k.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2hzmfc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/s6rkuh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/20at55s.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/okppvc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/oau03m.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2r3b6h2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/9uu4bs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/xc155f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2vaiihj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2vd4ad4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2gwi0yr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/23msmyw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/259xv79.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2128xlj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2d9bsp5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2uh6a6c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/29msuav.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/scgft2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/ehhmbs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/29vzzab.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2zhgkmt.png[/img]
[SIZE=5][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR="#FF0000"]Why are we different? [/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/CENTER] [CODE]1.All skills are trainable. 2.A lot of different modes 3.A challenging server. 4.We have like 90% runescape dungeons 5.All bosses are available the way it's added in runescape [Nex] [Godwars] [QBD] [Fight caves] [Fight kiln] 6.The ability to try all of our minigames [Pest control] [Barrows] etc. We sure provide more fun, join and see yourself.[/CODE]
[SIZE=5][FONT=Comic Sans MS][COLOR="#FF0000"][CENTER]Thank you for having a look at my Runescape private server project, hope you wish me luck inthere, maybe join up and get some fun, This server was Released : 30/1/2015[/CENTER][/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]

item.title: ★ Soulstorm [718] ★ [The comeback of the missing land] ★ VPS hosted
item.dc:creator: @visibleboy7 visibleboy7
item.description:
@visibleboy7 wrote:

[CENTER]

[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=4][COLOR="#FF0000"]As you know, that one day Xymo-scape gone off, i decided the comeback will be stronger! it will have more hard work and patience… this time, Soulstorm is going to replace Xymo-scape with a better version from ALL the sides.[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=Century Gothic]JAR Link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/7dqclbl4xs84cor/Soulstorm.jar?dl=0[/FONT][/CENTER]
[FONT=Century Gothic][CENTER]Website: http://soulstorm718.com[/CENTER][/FONT]

[CENTER][COLOR="#FF0000"][SIZE=4][FONT=Century Gothic]Now, here is every single step i did in that game to make it one of the most professional world-wide Runescape private servers:[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]

Fixed all anti-leeches fixed toolbelt (wont delete item after adding to toolbelt) Added charms drop for all monsters Added bank pins/reseting bank pins -- FIXED Fixed changing display Fixed prestiging - resets all your skills now Trivia rewards! FIXED! Crystal chest FIXED added crystal chest rewards! added dungeoneering points to actiontab added prestige button to account manager with number of your prestiges! removed every shit out of shops Fixed all shops fixed crafting buttons! (press craft on opal etc) Added black marks added Playedtime recording All npcs with 1 hp now has hp max hit and combat level added troll invasion added troll invasion dialogue added troll points add troll shop Changed captain jute options to (talk-to, rewards) Updated Troll book info! updated all troll invasion with the info and rewards and the book is ready added herbicide added bonecrusher fixed eos pkp points shop Added the xp well added a timer for xp well! added xp well time in action tab Xp well is now 8 hours and it resets to 0 after the resetment Added osp exchanging shop Added ecto tokens shop (named it zombies) added stuff to zombies shop changed the whole prestige shop Fixed if higher difficulty, more points Fixed developer panel Prestige is now unlimited Prestige shop prices has been changed fixed slayer x0 infernal mage problem Fixed chaos tunnels stairs and spawns fixed ancient cavern stairs and spawns fixed Lumbridge swamp fixed Fremennik slayer dungeon fixed slayer tower fixed taverly dungeon fixed polypore dungeon fixed brimhaven dungeon fixed jadinko lair added mos le'harmless cave adding stronghold of secuity all doors, rewards, skeleton, escape. added asgarian npc dump, skeletal wyvern, going into the hole Fixed pendants added chatlogs added tradelogs fixed Seeker's charm added smoke dungeon added desert lizards added wizard mizgog to slayer teles fixed glacors added strykewyrms! added all bones to get buried added all bones on altar! fixed warning reset after the ban added unwarning to reset all your black marks adding recipe for disaster fixed changing display issue (refunded if (invalid name) or (name alraedy in use)) Added Armour stand added a teleportation system fixed all training teles fixed all low/med/high training! fixed waterfall doors karamja volcano fixed grotworms cave added wildy wyrm fixed waterfall dungeon fixed bronze dragons fixed dwagore dungeon with spawns fixed yklagor the thundors fixed glacors added glacors npcs added bonuses for everything Added Soulstorm guide added starting tutorial fixed abusing starters (only 1 time talk) added skiller shop fixed the whole stronghold of security dungeon with all npcs added full slayer. added resettask fixed slayer points fixed slayer interface fixed slayer helm + fully charged one fixed the quest tab fixed the new quest tab with good ideas added donor infos added a better ticket system handling added the difficulty pop up so you can choose carefully fixed the going out of tutorial island without starter fixed full agility fixed all gnome agility with the plane 3 and jumpling the pre swing fixed barbarian outspot fixed wilderness agility fixed pyramid added farming fixed yew trees fixed mage tress [added] now you can cut the yew/mage logs and after several logs it restarts added sunfreet added arior added auto getting in clan added abbys runecrafting added obelisk wilderness removed Charms from all shops added construction level requirement for the work bench finished adding level required for all the interface finished all xp given added all interfaces with all xp and things on construction fixed spam reloading cannon added cannon in prestige shop fixed account manager prestige equipment fixed gano drops + shop removed added drop logs fixed some drops blink, gano, arior etc fixed xp for all difficulties fixed drop rates for all difficulties added kills log added dragonkin lamp with dialogue and great xp! added effigy drop higher difficulty = more prestige tokens = more loyalty = more drop rate added accepted trade added declined trade added runespan added skilling to teleportation system added pk to teleportation system added agility dialogue fixed runespan added minigames to teleportation system fixed mining teleports added gem mining Progress finishing the teleportation system fixed fishing teleports added dungeoneering Added dungeoneering dialogue fixed xp + tokens from normal xp fixed summoning places fixed thieving stalls fixed theiving rewards fixed thieving teleports fixed smithing teleports fixed crafting prices fixed theiving prices finished the whole teleportation system (spriti tree now) removed all object for edgeville started with edgeville home fixed deleting objects on the source Deleted all neccesary object at edgeville added spirit tree fixed spades at barrows spawned npcs at edgeville spawned objects at edgeville Finished building home (edgeville) with teleporting ;;home and respawning there. more fixing on teleportation system fixed the trivia fixed all questions to trivia changed lyrics only 3 players per round spawned well more xp well fixing fixed trivia null "[i]" general fixes on action tab more progress on home stuff fixed taking a high level slayer master fixed slayer 100% points + system spawned all slayer masters added torva degerade when fight fixed donor information added more features to donors double xp to donors fixed titles added comp cape requirements fixed some shops added more shops named all npcs added highscores removed pk ranks! added trivia shop fixed trivia shop glitches (spins not working) general fixes to trivia added sports fixed sports questions added every single offhand in sunfreet added loyalty tent spawned loyalty shop added hunter teleports fixed player server messages added dicing fc added fury or to arior drops fixed trivia added full pest control fixed pest control portal fighting fixed pest control shop added seed pack added mineral pack added herb pack fixed lander leaving herb packs now gives for 30 points : a pack of herb Mineral packs now gives for 30 points : runite/adamantite ores seeds packs now gives for 30 points : yew/mage seeds added grimy wally, can now give good profit for players added pest controls wins as a requirement for comp cape added leeuni added lucien fixed low levels teleport fixed all teleports at the interface for teleporting added full godwars spawned all godwars npcs

[CENTER][SIZE=5][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR="#FF0000"]MEDIA:[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]





























[SIZE=5][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR="#FF0000"]Why are we different? [/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/CENTER]

1.All skills are trainable. 2.A lot of different modes 3.A challenging server. 4.We have like 90% runescape dungeons 5.All bosses are available the way it's added in runescape [Nex] [Godwars] [QBD] [Fight caves] [Fight kiln] 6.The ability to try all of our minigames [Pest control] [Barrows] etc. We sure provide more fun, join and see yourself.

[SIZE=5][FONT=Comic Sans MS][COLOR="#FF0000"][CENTER]Thank you for having a look at my Runescape private server project, hope you wish me luck inthere, maybe join up and get some fun, This server was Released : 30/1/2015[/CENTER][/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]
